mapper.insert: insert into hms_comm(content, writer, board_id) values(#{content}, #{writer.no}, #{boardNo})
mapper.select: select cm.comment_id, cm.writer, cm.content, cm.created_date, cm.board_id, b.board_id from hms_comm cm inner join hms_gall b on cm.board_id=b.board_id where cm.board_id=#{boardNo}
